languages.text: {n}Ханн медлит — видно, как в нем борется долг и гордость. Наконец, он опускает голову.{/n} "Я — представитель Навис Нобилите, что превосходит власть Имперского флота... но я не могу перечить человеку, наделенному высшим титулом флота Даргонус. Я сойду с вами с корабля..."

{n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ханн медлит — видно, как в нем борется долг и гордость. Наконец, он опускает голову.{/n} "Я — представитель Навис Нобилите, что превосходит власть Имперского флота... но я не могу перечить человеку, наделенному высшим титулом флота Даргонус. Я сойду с вами с корабля..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will leave the ship with you..."

{n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

{n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

{n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

languages.text: {n}ハンはしばらくためらうと、義務と誇りの間で葛藤し、頭を下げた。{/n}「私は航宙貴族の一員であり、帝国海軍に従属する者ではありません…それでも、ダルゴナス艦隊の最高位の称号を持つ者には逆らうことができません。私はあなたとともに船を下ります…」
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンはしばらくためらうと、義務と誇りの間で葛藤し、頭を下げた。{/n}「私は航宙貴族の一員であり、帝国海軍には従うものではない…それでも、ダルゴナス艦隊の最高の称号を持つ者には逆らうことができません。私はあなたとともに船を下ります…」

languages.text: {n}Hann hésite un instant, déchiré entre son devoir et sa fierté. Il incline finalement la tête.{/n} « Je suis un membre de la Navis Nobilite, et je ne dépends donc pas de la Marine Impériale... Cependant, je ne peux pas désobéir aux ordres {mf|du détenteur|de la détentrice} du titre le plus élevé de la flotte de Dargonus. Je quitterai le vaisseau à vos côtés... »
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann hésite un instant, déchiré entre son devoir et sa fierté. Il incline finalement la tête.{/n} « Je suis un membre de la Navis Nobilite, et je ne dépends donc pas de la Marine Impériale... Cependant, je ne peux pas désobéir aux ordres {mf|du détenteur|de la détentrice} du titre le plus élevé de la flotte de Dargonus. Je quitterai le vaisseau à vos côtés... »

languages.text: {n}汉恩犹豫着，在责任与尊严之间徘徊，随后低下了头。{/n}“我是导航宗族舰队的成员，因此并不听命于帝国海军……不过，我无权违抗达戈努斯舰队最高指挥官的命令。我愿意与您一同下船……”
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩犹豫着，在责任与尊严之间徘徊，随后低下了头。{/n}“我是导航宗族舰队的成员，因此并不听命于帝国海军……不过，我无权违抗达戈努斯舰队最高指挥官的命令。我愿意与您一同下船……”

languages.text: {n}Hann titubea durante un instante, dividido entre el deber y el orgullo, y asiente.{/n} «Pertenezco a la Navis Nobilite y, por ende, no respondo ante la Armada Imperial... Sin embargo, no puedo desobedecer a quien ostenta el título más alto de la flota de Dargonus. Desembarcaré con usted...».
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann titubea durante un instante, dividido entre el deber y el orgullo, y asiente.{/n} «Pertenezco a la Navis Nobilite y, por ende, no respondo ante la Armada Imperial... Sin embargo, no puedo desobedecer a quien ostenta el título más alto de la flota de Dargonus. Desembarcaré con usted...».

languages.text: {n}Hann zögert einen Augenblick, hin- und hergerissen zwischen Pflicht und Stolz. Dann neigt er den Kopf.{/n} "Ich gehöre zur Navis Nobilite und unterstehe daher nicht der Imperialen Kriegsflotte ... und doch kann ich mich {mf|dem Träger|der Trägerin} des höchsten Titels der Flotte von Dargonus nicht widersetzen. Ich verlasse das Schiff mit Euch ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann zögert einen Augenblick, hin- und hergerissen zwischen Pflicht und Stolz. Dann neigt er den Kopf.{/n} "Ich gehöre zur Navis Nobilite und unterstehe daher nicht der Imperialen Kriegsflotte ... und doch kann ich mich {mf|dem Träger|der Trägerin} des höchsten Titels der Flotte von Dargonus nicht widersetzen. Ich verlasse das Schiff mit Euch ..."

languages.text: {n}Vazifesi ve gururu arasında kalan Hann, bir süre tereddüt edip ardından başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ben Navis Nobilite'yim, dolayısıyla İmparatorluk Donanması'nın yetki kapsamında değilim. Ancak Dargonus filosunun en yüksek rütbelisine itaatsizlik edemem. Sizinle birlikte gemiden ayrılacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann hesitates for a while, torn between duty and pride. Then he bows his head.{/n} "I am of the Navis Nobilite and thus do not answer to the Imperial Navy... and yet I cannot disobey the bearer of the highest title of the Dargonus fleet. I will disembark the ship with you..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vazifesi ve gururu arasında kalan Hann bir süre tereddüt ediyor, ardından başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ben Navis Nobilite'yim ve dolayısıyla İmparatorluk Donanması'nın üzerimde bir yetkisi yoktur ancak Dargonus filosunun en yüksek rütbesine yine de itaatsizlik edemem. Sizinle birlikte gemiden ayrılacağım."
